scripts.prisma:generate:docker: docker run --rm --network magazyn_default -e DATABASE_URL=%DATABASE_URL% -v "$(Get-Location):/app" -w /app node:20-alpine sh -lc "npm i -g prisma@latest && prisma generate"
scripts.prisma:migrate:docker: docker run --rm --network magazyn_default -e DATABASE_URL=%DATABASE_URL% -v "$(Get-Location):/app" -w /app node:20-alpine sh -lc "npm i -g prisma@latest && prisma migrate deploy"
scripts.prisma:studio:docker: docker run --rm -p 5555:5555 --network magazyn_default -e DATABASE_URL=%DATABASE_URL% -v "$(Get-Location):/app" -w /app node:20-alpine sh -lc "npm i -g prisma@latest && prisma studio --browser none --port 5555"
scripts.seed:docker: docker run --rm --network magazyn_default -e DATABASE_URL=%DATABASE_URL% -v "$(Get-Location):/app" -w /app node:20-alpine sh -lc "npm i --no-audit --no-fund && npx prisma generate && node prisma/seed.mjs"
